function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of preparedness for pandemic outbreaks","Impact":"Potential for uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Developing long-term strategies and preventive measures for pandemic outbreaks","Technologies":"Advanced medical facilities, diagnostic tools, surveillance systems","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, vulnerable communities","Owner":"Government health organizations, international health associations, private healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Ineffective monitoring and surveillance of contagious diseases","Impact":"Difficulty in tracking and managing disease spread","Mitigation":"Implementing periodic checks and diagnostic surveillance systems","Technologies":"Diagnostic tools, surveillance systems","People":"Global population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government health organizations, international health associations"},{"Description":"Inadequate focus on community-centered treatment","Impact":"Risk of uncontrolled spread within communities","Mitigation":"Shifting focus from patient-centered to community-centered treatment, implementing community-based healthcare strategies","Technologies":"Community healthcare models, telemedicine systems","People":"Local communities, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, local government authorities, community leaders"}]}
